title: Game sausage roll with wild mushrooms and pickled walnuts
description: These moist, hearty sausage rolls are packed with game and full of flavour - try them as canapés at a Christmas party.
ingredients: 300g/10½oz minced mixed game (such as venison, pheasant and mallard)
2 free-range eggs, plus 1 free-range egg yolk, beaten, for egg wash
salt and freshly ground black pepper
